positive_examples: This is an example of bargaining game.
The bargaining game demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed bargaining game in this context.
A typical case of bargaining game would involve these features.
The concept of bargaining game applies here.
A cooperative game focused on how players negotiate and agree on the division of joint gains.
negative_examples: This is an example of evolutionary game, not bargaining game.
This represents cooperative game in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvolutionaryGame, or other types of CooperativeGame

definition: A cooperative game modeling negotiation over division of resources or surplus.
